creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: Japanese maple bonsai plant with red and pink leaves set against a yellow-orange background; green moss in clay colored planter at bottom; two green leaves at top
marks: LLC: [Maple]; L margin: {1970 nen saku momiji} hir LRC, in pencil: [Tsukasa Yoshida]
title: Maple
